actions.description: The githyanki makes two Greatsword or Telekinetic Bolt attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) psychic damage.
actions.name: Greatsword

actions.description: 5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) force damage.
actions.name: Telekinetic Bolt

actions.description:
The githyanki casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
At will: light, mage hand (the hand is invisible)

1/day each: plane shift, telekinesis
actions.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
